title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, push, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’).

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight Node CLI wrapper around the Ollama REST API with prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: LlamaIndex reader + LLM integration for building RAG pipelines on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker & docker-compose examples (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-chatbot (Streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that talks to Ollama via the Python SDK.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models (Windows/macOS/Linux).

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM power to any server via Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on your notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command for chatting with local models.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed.
